General.Name: L.D.C. S.A.
General.Description: L.D.C. S.A. produces and sells poultry and processed products in France and internationally. The company also offers ready-cooked dishes, pizzas, pancakes and biscuits, and sandwiches, as well as fresh and frozen products. It offers its products under the Le Gaulois, Maître CoQ, Loué, Marie, Poule & Toque, Nature & Respect, Drosed, Goldenfood, and Doux brands. The company was founded in 1909 and is based in Sablé-sur-Sarthe, France.
General.Address: Zone industrielle Saint Laurent, Sablé-sur-Sarthe, France, 72302
